div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Wk. of September 3, 1898. p.41.

body.p: Last Sunday night, before an audience that filled the temple of the North Chicago Hebrew Congregation to the doors, the Rev. Abram Hirchberg was solemnly installed as Rabbi. The young man, who is but 22 years of age, graduated this year from the Hebrew Union College, and was elected by the congregation to succeed the Rev. A. Norden.
